thread.title: Former SportsCenter Anchor on Layoffs: ESPN Is Now a ‘Soulless Monolith’
thread.title_full: Former SportsCenter Anchor on Layoffs: ESPN Is Now a ‘Soulless Monolith’

title: Former SportsCenter Anchor on Layoffs: ESPN Is Now a ‘Soulless Monolith’
text:
Published By: Media Ite - Today 
As ESPN begins laying off as many as 300 employees, one former anchor for the network says it has now turned into a "soulless monolith."...
